thread.section_title: Hotel Elysees Union - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: the best
thread.title_full: the best - Review of Hotel Elysees Union, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: yigalkatan
title: the best
text:
excellent location,excellant room for family and excellant view.
the staff are nice and helpful and make you feel at home
8 minuhtes to arc the triumph 10 min to tour eiffel
you can see from your room the lights at night of tour eiffel.
some restaurants close by ,pharmacy and a little supermarket by the hotel.
Room Tip: dont hassitate take this hotel for your next vacation See more room tips
